description.zh-cn: 中国《环球时报》下属环球网的前记者、编辑。因在2019年香港反对逃犯条例修订草案运动期间，于香港国际机场遭示威者袭击时喊出“我支持香港警察，你们可以打我了”而知名。后因抑郁症去世。
description.en: A former reporter and editor for Global Times' website, huanqiu.com. He gained prominence during the 2019 anti-extradition bill protests in Hong Kong after being assaulted by protesters at Hong Kong International Airport, where he shouted, 'I support Hong Kong police. You can beat me now.' He later died due to depression.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪的父亲，退伍军人。曾在天津市作家协会担任职务。在付国豪去世后，通过社交媒体发布信息并指责胡锡进。
description.en: Fu Guohao's father, a veteran. He held a position at the Tianjin Writers Association. After his son's death, he released information and accused Hu Xijin via social media.

description.zh-cn: 《环球时报》总编辑，曾是付国豪的上司。
description.en: Editor-in-chief of the Global Times and Fu Guohao's former superior.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪的母校。
description.en: Fu Guohao's alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪大学期间实习的报社。
description.en: The newspaper where Fu Guohao interned during his university years.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪大学毕业后曾在此工作。
description.en: A news website where Fu Guohao worked after graduating from university.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪曾任职的中国媒体机构。
description.en: The Chinese media organization where Fu Guohao worked.

description.zh-cn: 《环球时报》下属的网站，付国豪曾在此任职。
description.en: The website affiliated with the Global Times where Fu Guohao was employed.

nodes.id: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

zh-cn: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 2019年在香港发生的一系列示威活动。在此运动期间，付国豪在香港国际机场遭到示威者袭击。
description.en: A series of demonstrations that took place in Hong Kong in 2019. During this movement, Fu Guohao was attacked by protesters at Hong Kong International Airport.

description.zh-cn: 2019年8月13日，付国豪在香港国际机场被反对逃犯条例修订草案运动的示威者捆绑围殴的事件。
description.en: On August 13, 2019, Fu Guohao was tied up and assaulted by protesters of the Anti-Extradition Law Amendment Bill Movement at Hong Kong International Airport.

description.zh-cn: 一种精神障碍，付国豪在经历遇袭事件后患上此病，并最终因此去世。
description.en: A mental disorder that Fu Guohao developed after the assault incident, which ultimately led to his death.

description.zh-cn: 因参与袭击付国豪而被判刑的人员之一。
description.en: One of the individuals sentenced for participating in the assault on Fu Guohao.

description.zh-cn: 因参与袭击付国豪而被判刑的人员之一。
description.en: One of the individuals sentenced for participating in the assault on Fu Guohao.

description.zh-cn: 因参与袭击付国豪而被判刑的人员之一。
description.en: One of the individuals sentenced for participating in the assault on Fu Guohao.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国新闻出版总署

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国新闻出版总署

description.zh-cn: 颁布《新闻记者证管理办法》的中华人民共和国政府机构。
description.en: The government agency of the People's Republic of China that issued the 'Measures for the Administration of Press Cards'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国关于新闻记者证申领与核发的规定。
description.en: Regulations of the People's Republic of China concerning the application and issuance of press cards.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪是付成学的儿子。
description.en: Fu Guohao is the son of Fu Chengxue.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪出生于天津市。
description.en: Fu Guohao was born in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪2009年被中国海洋大学录取，2011年转入新闻学专业，2015年毕业。
description.en: Fu Guohao was admitted to Ocean University of China in 2009, transferred to the journalism major in 2011, and graduated in 2015.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪大学四年级时在《天津日报》实习。
description.en: Fu Guohao interned at Tianjin Daily during his fourth year of university.

description.zh-cn: 大学毕业后，付国豪在北京世华万向资讯公司（多维新闻网）负责香港与台湾新闻的编辑工作两年。
description.en: After graduating from university, Fu Guohao worked as an editor for Hong Kong and Taiwan news at Duowei News (Beijing Shihua Wanxiang Information Co.) for two years.

position.en: Editor-in-Chief of Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan Channel

description.zh-cn: 付国豪在环球网工作，并兼任港澳台频道主编。
description.en: Fu Guohao worked at huanqiu.com and also served as the editor-in-chief of its Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan channel.

description.zh-cn: 环球网是《环球时报》下属的网站。
description.en: Huanqiu.com is a website under the Global Times.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪在《环球时报》任职期间，胡锡进是其总编辑。
description.en: While Fu Guohao worked at the Global Times, Hu Xijin was his editor-in-chief.

relationships.source: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 在反对逃犯条例修订草案运动期间，示威者在香港国际机场发起了集会，并导致了付国豪遇袭事件的发生。
description.en: During the Anti-Extradition Law Amendment Bill Movement, protesters held a rally at Hong Kong International Airport, which led to the assault on Fu Guohao.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪在香港国际机场被示威者袭击和殴打。
description.en: Fu Guohao was assaulted and beaten by protesters at Hong Kong International Airport.

description.zh-cn: 在香港国际机场袭击付国豪，后被裁定暴动及袭击等罪成，判监63个月。
description.en: Assaulted Fu Guohao at Hong Kong International Airport, was later convicted of rioting and assault, and sentenced to 63 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 在香港国际机场袭击付国豪，后被裁定暴动及袭击等罪成，判监51个月。
description.en: Assaulted Fu Guohao at Hong Kong International Airport, was later convicted of rioting and assault, and sentenced to 51 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 在香港国际机场袭击付国豪，后被裁定暴动及袭击等罪成，判监66个月。
description.en: Assaulted Fu Guohao at Hong Kong International Airport, was later convicted of rioting and assault, and sentenced to 66 months in prison.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪在遇袭事件后出现创伤性症状，并被诊断出患有抑郁症。
description.en: After the assault incident, Fu Guohao developed traumatic symptoms and was diagnosed with depression.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪因抑郁症去世。
description.en: Fu Guohao died due to depression.

description.zh-cn: 环球时报召开香港报导表彰会，授予付国豪人民币10万元的最高奖。
description.en: The Global Times held a commendation meeting for its Hong Kong coverage and awarded Fu Guohao the highest prize of 100,000 RMB.

description.zh-cn: 付成学在天津市作家协会担任职务。
description.en: Fu Chengxue held a position at the Tianjin Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 付国豪父亲付成学在社交媒体上指责胡锡进，称付国豪的抑郁症与胡锡进相关。
description.en: Fu Guohao's father, Fu Chengxue, accused Hu Xijin on social media, claiming that Hu was related to his son's depression.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国新闻出版总署

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国新闻出版总署颁布了《新闻记者证管理办法》。
description.en: The General Administration of Press and Publication of the People's Republic of China issued the 'Measures for the Administration of Press Cards'.
